actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable George M.  O'Brien, a Representative from the State of Illinois.

summary.text: Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable George M. O'Brien, of Illinois.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable George M.  O'Brien, a Representative from the State of Illinois.
